verses.name: Numbers 13:28
verses.text: Nevertheless the people be strong that dwell in the land, and the cities are walled, and very great: and moreover we saw the children of Anak there.

verses.name: Numbers 13:29
verses.text: The Amalekites dwell in the land of the south: and the Hittites, and the Jebusites, and the Amorites, dwell in the mountains: and the Canaanites dwell by the sea, and by the coast of Jordan.

verses.name: Numbers 13:30
verses.text: And Caleb stilled the people before Moses, and said, Let us go up at once, and possess it; for we are well able to overcome it.
